data.text: @vermontgmg Interesting read — thanks for sharing! Beyond the logistical factors I wonder how much social trust played into it, given how positively postal workers are generally viewed compared to most other government officials.
@JacobRubashkin @vermontgmg I just started this, as well. Graff is such a superb writer.
@JacobRubashkin I wrote about it at the start, and there was USPS’s plan to distribute masks that Trump killed, but mostly no: https://t.co/L1xCHjKtwR
